summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 FORD FOCUS. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE STEERING WHEEL SHOOK WHILE DRIVING AT LOWER SPEEDS. THE CONTACT TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE FOOTHILL FORD DEALER WHERE IT WAS DIAGNOSED THAT THE STEERING CLUTCH FAILED AND NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THE CLUTCH WAS REPLACED TWICE UNDER WARRANTY; HOWEVER, THE FAILURE RECURRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE AND INFORMED THE CONTACT THAT THE REPAIR WAS NO LONGER COVERED UNDER WARRANTY. THE CONTACT WAS REFERRED TO NHTSA TO FILE A COMPLAINT AND WAS ADVISED TO REFERENCE NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 14V514000 (STEERING) AS THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE. THE APPROXIMATE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 56,000. UPDATED 08/23/17*LJ  *TR
